intent_atoms.description: Build SwiftUI app shell with document browser and recents list, wiring CoreData-backed session persistence into the app shell.
Configure performance benchmarks for large files to validate CLI and app throughput for streaming MP4 analysis.
Benchmark harness implementation must track against performance NFRs called out in the execution guide and PRD while instrumentation hooks land.
CoreData-backed session persistence must remain stable as CLI scaffolding is stable and C1/C2 foundations remain green.
